bike.description: Jamis CX Dyad Elite M30/T700 Monocoque Carbon Fiber Frame, FEA optimized Near Net molding process, formed down tube and top tube for comfortable portage with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO386 carbon BB shell, ACE internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, rider tuned twin seat stays with post mount disc mounts and brake strut on non-driveside for vibration-free braking, asymmetrical chainstays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.

components.description: Jamis CX carbon fiber fork, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, post disc brake mounts with integrated carbon cable cradle with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Pro Logic Zero Drop In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
American Classic Argent Tubeless wheelset, 32H, 19mmID x 30mm aero rim profile, AC disc hubs with sealed bearings and AC round spokes
Clement Crusade PDX, 700 x 33c, 120TPI, folding kevlar bead
SRAM Force22 11-Speed derailleurs with braze-on front
SRAM RED22 Hydraulic Double Tap with Zero-Loss shift technology, 22-Speed
FSA SLK Light EVO cross double with Press Fit BB system including ceramic bearings, 46/36T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
SRAM RED22 Hydraulic disc brakes, 19mm front and 18mm rear piston, 160mm front/140mm rear rotors and SRAM RED33 brake levers
Ritchey Pro EVO Curve, 7075 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm(48/51), 420mm(54/56), 440mm(58/61)
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil+Kevlar+High Frequency cover and hollow chromoly-moly rails
